entry.summary:
Author: OneStepShort

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,436Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 5

Summary: In 1988, the Hale family is betrayed and massacred in the final blow of the war with the Hunters, and Derek abruptly becomes an alpha by bloodline through the tragedy. Burned and scarred, he’s captured and experimented on by a new kind of human evil that seeks to unlock the secrets of supernatural power.In 2013, a reckless young hunter Stiles Stilinski is tasked with rescuing the captive werewolf from his years of torment. But saving a broken Derek Hale might just cost him everything…
